fields.lmt_analysis_version_changes: Initial code for reliability. Analysis code is a fork of lmt-analysis on July 13, 2022.

fields.lmt_toolkit_version_changes:
Pre release version:
Wrong message color if temperature higher than 26Â°C corrected.
BootstrapVue3 updated to v0.3.11
fields.lmt_analysis_version_changes:
LMT-analysis upgraded (v1.0.0 to v1.0.3):
Event "approach contact" corrected (v1.0.1).
Events "follow zone" and "side walk" updated: they no longer compute on a detection where the head and tail are not detected (v1.0.1).
Fix a problem with the Nest3_ event. The stop condition necessary is now considered correctly (v1.0.2).
Fix an head/tail problem condition in the followzone event (v1.0.3).

fields.lmt_toolkit_version_changes:
Reliability section added.
Selection of events changed.
Documentation updated.
CSV results file with version name of LMT-toolkit and the name of the experiment.
Bugs corrections.
Users can target their analysis to a given time period.
fields.lmt_analysis_version_changes:
LMT-analysis upgraded (v1.0.3 to v1.0.5):
MouseAutomaticProfile don't create text file anymore (v1.0.4).
RFID added and group name modified (v1.0.4).
fix: "Rebuild all events" was changed in v1.0.4, (leading to an import error + only the followZone event was computed) (v1.0.5).

fields.lmt_toolkit_version_changes:
SQLite files can be downloaded after the rebuild process.
The list of saved SQLite files can be found on the File List page. Each saved SQLite file can be deleted from this page.
fields.lmt_analysis_version_changes: v1.0.5 problem fixed with animalType: solved in Rebuild_All_Events.py

fields.lmt_toolkit_version_changes: First production release. New frontend (Nuxt). Step-by-step analysis. Possibility to add information in the animal table of the sqlite file. More flexibility for future developments. Versions and documentation into the database.
Nuxt version upgraded. Installation improvements. Activity per time bin analysis added.
fields.lmt_analysis_version_changes: New function added to analyse activity per time bin. TODO: add the new function and create a new lmt-analysis release.

fields.lmt_toolkit_version_changes: All packages updated. Several bugs corrected: problem with reliability display, possibility to do several analysis on a same file and simple preset analysis works even start time and / or end time fields are empty. Installation with Docker. Enhancements: progression feedback during rebuild, possibility to skip rebuild process if the file is already rebuild (save the version of the rebuild script).
fields.lmt_analysis_version_changes: New function added to analyse openfield and dyadic experiments. Several bugs corrections.

fields.name: Total distance
fields.description: Total distance in meters travelled by the focus animal during all the experiment or between time limits.

fields.name: Single move
fields.description: The focal animal is moving (speed > 5 m/s) without being in contact with any other animal (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Move in contact
fields.description: The focal animal is moving (speed > 5 m/s) while being in contact with another animal (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Stop isolated
fields.description: The focal animal is resting (not moving) without being in contact with any other animal (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Rear isolated
fields.description: The focal animal is straightened on its hindlegs (either unsupported or against the wall). Rearing is considered when the body slope is higher than a threshold (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events). This event has to be validated!

fields.name: Rear in contact
fields.description:
The focal animal is straightened on its hindlegs (either unsupported or against the wall). Rearing is considered when the body slope is higher than a threshold (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).
This event has to be validated!

fields.name: Contact
fields.description: The focal animal is touching another individual (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Group of 2
fields.description:
The focal animal is touching one and only one other individual (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).
This event has to be validated!

fields.name: Group of 3
fields.description: The focal animal is touching two and only two other individuals (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events). This event has to be validated!

fields.name: Nose-nose
fields.description: The focal animal is sniffing the nose of another animal (i.e., the nose is at a whisker distance from the nose of the other animal) (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Nose-anogenital
fields.description: The focal animal is sniffing the ano-genital region of another animal (i.e., the nose is at a whisker distance from the tail basis of the other animal) (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Side-side
fields.description: The flank of the focal animal is in contact with the flank of another animal; both animals head in the same direction (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Side-side head-to-tail
fields.description: The flank of the focal animal is in contact with the flank of another animal; both animals head in opposite directions (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Train 2
fields.description: The focal animal is moving (speed > 5 m/s) while sniffing the ano-genital region of another animal also moving (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Follow
fields.description: The focal animal is walking in the path of another individual: the two animals are moving at a speed >5 cm/s, the angles between the two animals are less than 45Â° apart, and the mass centre of the follower (the focal animal) is within a follow zone of one mean body length of width and two mean body lengths of length (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Social approach
fields.description: The focal animal gets closer to another one within a circular zone of 2 body lengths around the approached animal (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Approach contact
fields.description: The focal animal gets closer to another one within a circular zone of two body lengths around the approached animal; the approach ends by a contact between the two animals (total duration, number of events, mean duration of events).

fields.name: Make group 3
fields.description: The focal animal is joining a group of two animals to form a group of three animals in contact (number of events). This event has to be validated!

fields.name: Make group 4
fields.description: The focal animal is joining a group of three animals to form a group of four animals in contact (number of events). This event has to be validated!

fields.name: Break contact
fields.description: The focal animal is getting away (higher speed) from the animal it has been in contact with; the speed of the focal animal is higher than the speed of the other animal (number of events).

fields.name: Break group 3
fields.description: The focal animal is leaving a group of three animals to let a group of two animals in contact; the focal animal has the highest speed among the three animals in contact (number of events). This event has to be validated!

fields.name: Break group 4
fields.description: The focal animal is leaving a group of four animals, that remain as a group of three animals in contact; the focal animal has the highest speed among the four animals in contact (number of events). This event has to be validated!
